BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: [Failure Store] Access for internal users (#125660) This PR grants `manage_failure_store` to the internal user `_data_stream_lifecycle` to enable life-cycle management for the failure indices of data stream, which includes rollovers using the failures selector. I'm only unit testing this but we also need to add DLM tests for the failure store with security enabled. Relates: ES-11355
